ITEM_1-1.caption: rxMode EmuNAND
ITEM_1-1.description: Apply patches and reboot the console into rxMode on EmuNAND, if present.

ITEM_1-2.caption: rxMode SysNAND
ITEM_1-2.description: Apply patches and reboot the console into rxMode on SysNAND.

ITEM_1-3.caption: Pasta mode
ITEM_1-3.description: Patches signature checks and load in SysNAND with GBA and DSi support.

ITEM_2-1.caption: CTR Titles
ITEM_2-1.description: Decrypt 3DS titles directly on the console.

ITEM_2-2.caption: Title Keys
ITEM_2-2.description: Decrypt title keys stored in tickets.db which is needed to decrypt CDN content.

ITEM_2-3.caption: encTitleKeys.bin
ITEM_2-3.description: Decrypt the private key of a game.

ITEM_2-4.caption: Generate XORpads
ITEM_2-4.description: Generate XORpads for titles and NAND partitions.

ITEM_2-4-1.caption: SD
ITEM_2-4-1.description: Generate XORpads needed to decrypt and encrypt 3DS titles from SDinfo.bin.

ITEM_2-4-2.caption: NCCH
ITEM_2-4-2.description: Generate XORpads needed to decrypt and encrypt 3DS titles from ncchinfo.bin.

ITEM_2-4-3.caption: TWL
ITEM_2-4-3.description: Generate XORpad of the TWL (DSi) partition.

ITEM_2-4-4.caption: TWLN
ITEM_2-4-4.description: Generate XORpad of the TWL (DSi) FAT16 partition (TWL logical partition 0).

ITEM_2-4-5.caption: TWLP
ITEM_2-4-5.description: Generate XORpad of the TWL (DSi) FAT12 photo partition (TWL logical partition 1).

ITEM_2-4-6.caption: AGB_SAVE
ITEM_2-4-6.description: Generate XORpad of the AGB (GBA) savegame partition.

ITEM_2-4-7.caption: FIRM0
ITEM_2-4-7.description: Generate XORpad of the first firmware partition.

ITEM_2-4-8.caption: FIRM1
ITEM_2-4-8.description: Generate XORpad of the second firmware partition.

ITEM_2-4-9.caption: CTR
ITEM_2-4-9.description: Generate XORpad of the CTR partition.

ITEM_2-4-10.caption: CTRNAND
ITEM_2-4-10.description: Generate XORpad of the CTR (3DS) FAT 16 partition (CTR logical partition 0).

ITEM_6-1.caption: Install MSET 4
ITEM_6-1.description: Install old MSET 4.x in SysNAND to use with DS profile exploit on firmwares 5.x-9.2. Not compatible with 2DS.

ITEM_6-2.caption: Install MSET 6
ITEM_6-2.description: Install old MSET 6.x in SysNAND to use with DS profile exploit on firmwares 7.x-9.2.

ITEM_6-3.caption: Install FBI
ITEM_6-3.description: Install FBI (a legal .cia installed) over Health&Safety application in SysNAND.

ITEM_6-4.caption: Restore H&S App
ITEM_6-4.description: Uninstall FBI .cia installer and restore the original Health&Safety application.

ITEM_6-5.caption: Advanced File Manager
ITEM_6-5.description: Choose a firmare file on SD card and load it.

ITEM_8-2.caption: Keys
ITEM_8-2.description: Check various key files presence validity.

ITEM_8-2-1.caption: slot0x25KeyX.bin
ITEM_8-2-1.description: Required for 6.x save game encryption on console firmware version below 7.0
